start_message: Welcome to the Advanced AI Chatbot! Start typing to chat with me or use the commands below.
help_message: Here's how you can use this bot:
new_chat_started: Your chat history has been cleared. You can start a new conversation now.
rate_message: Please rate your experience with our bot:
image_generation_error: Error generating images. Please try again or try with a different prompt.
ocr_error: Error: Failed to extract text from image
command_not_allowed: You are not allowed to use this command.
ai_processing_error: An error occurred. Please try again later.
clear_history_error: An error occurred while clearing chat history
provide_message: Please provide a message to send.
provide_prompt: Please provide a prompt to generate images.
ai_command: Start a Chat with AI in Groups
img_command: Generate an image from the given prompt
new_command: Start a New Chat and Clear Previous Chat History
voice_message_info: Record a voice message for seamless interaction
image_message_info: Send an image with a caption like "ai" or "ask" for text extraction and interaction
welcome_message:
**Welcome {user_mention}!** üëã

I'm an advanced AI-powered Telegram bot that can:
- Chat intelligently using GPT-4
- Convert voice messages to text and vice versa
- Generate images from text descriptions
- Extract text from images
- Support multiple languages

Use the buttons below to explore my features!

**@AdvChatGptBot**
welcome_tip: üí° Tip: You can use /help to see all available commands!
voice_recognition_error: Sorry, I couldn't understand the audio. Please try speaking more clearly.
voice_service_error: There was an issue with the speech recognition service. Please try again later.
no_text_found: No text found in the image.
help_text_full:
**üìö Telegram @AdvChatGptBot 's Help Menu**

**üß† AI-Powered Features:**
- **Intelligent ChatBot (GPT-4)** - Engage in dynamic, context-aware conversations
- **Voice Interaction** - Seamlessly convert speech to text and vice versa
- **Image Generation (DALL-E 3)** - Transform your ideas into stunning visuals
- **Visual Analysis (Google Lens)** - Extract insights and text from any image

**‚öôÔ∏è Customization Options:**
- **üåê Language Preferences** - Communicate in your preferred language
- **üîî Smart Notifications** - Tailor alerts to your needs
- **üîí Privacy Controls** - Manage your data securely

**Commands:**
- **/start** - Start the Bot
- **/ai** - Start a Chat with AI in Groups 
- **/img or /image** - Generate Text from Image
- **/new or /newchat** - Start a New Chat and Clear Previous Chat History

**@AdvChatGptBot**
